meanings.definition: To make smaller or less significant in comparison.
meanings.sent1: The large tree bedwarfs the tiny flower next to it.
meanings.sent2: The big mountain bedwarfs the small hill beside it.
meanings.sent3: The giant cake bedwarfs the tiny cupcake on the table.
meanings.sent4: The massive building bedwarfs the small shed nearby.
meanings.sent5: The huge elephant bedwarfs the tiny mouse in the room.

meanings.definition: To overshadow or dominate in size or importance.
meanings.sent1: The bright sun bedwarfs the dim stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The loud thunder bedwarfs the soft rain outside.
meanings.sent3: The big umbrella bedwarfs the small raindrop falling.
meanings.sent4: The powerful lion bedwarfs the timid rabbit in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The grand castle bedwarfs the humble cottage nearby.
